children.name: callback
children.description: A callback function to gain complete control on when the responsive rule applies. Return true if it applies. This opens for checking against other metrics than the chart size, for example the document size or other elements.

children.name: maxHeight
children.description: The responsive rule applies if the chart height is less than this.

children.name: maxWidth
children.description: The responsive rule applies if the chart width is less than this.

children.name: minHeight
children.description: The responsive rule applies if the chart height is greater than this.

children.name: minWidth
children.description: The responsive rule applies if the chart width is greater than this.
